destinations.name: Basilica of Saint Anne
destinations.description: A magnificent basilica located in Brazzaville, famous for its unique architecture.

destinations.name: Loufoulakari Falls
destinations.description: Spectacular waterfalls, perfect for a nature getaway outside the city.

destinations.name: The Congo Rapids
destinations.description: An impressive view of the Congo River with powerful rapids.
